channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I have $50,000 in credit-card debt after my divorce, but received $30,000 after a car wreck. Do I buy a used Lexus?
item.description: “I previously drove a fully loaded BMW X7, and driving a used Lexus feels like a big drop.”

item.title: Medicare patients getting emergency surgery in private-equity hospitals are 42% more likely to die in the next 30 days. What’s going on?
item.description: New research raises concerns about the way these investment funds balance care and the pursuit of profits.

item.title: My father’s widow keeps sending me $200 checks in the mail. Why would she do this?
item.description: “I sent a ‘thank you’ card and asked what it was for, but I got no answer.”

item.title: What is AI really giving back to tech investors? Here’s the hard truth.
item.description: AI boosters cling to fanciful forecasts — even if meaningful revenue and productivity has yet to materialize.

item.title: I’m 57 and ready to retire next year on $7,500 a month, but my wife says no. Who’s right?
item.description: “I also have $300,000 in a 401(k). My wife has a 403(b) that currently sits at $650,000.”

item.title: Trump wants coal to power AI data centers. The tech industry may need to make peace with that for now
item.description: President Donald Trump's push to revive the coal industry is running up against the tech sector's environmental goals.

item.title: These stocks, including UnitedHealth, became the most oversold names this week
item.description: UnitedHealth and Fiserv tumbled this week and are now oversold based on their 14-day relative strength index reading, or RSI.

item.title: Irenic snaps up a stake in Couchbase. Here are two tracks the firm can take to create value
item.description: Activist Irenic has two paths to take at Couchbase to build value.

item.title: Here are five 'high quality' stocks with major upside, according to Bank of America
item.description: Bank of America says these five stocks have major upside.

item.title: This money manager won't follow Warren Buffett’s path with these two stocks Berkshire's buying
item.description: James Demmert of Main Street Research joined CNBC's "Power Lunch" on Friday to offer his take on three key market movers.
